title: H.R. Pufnstuf: the magic path
brief_description: On a walk through the forest, Jimmy and his magic flute Freddy are lured away by Witchiepoo to Living Island. They remain trapped when Witchiepoo makes the Magic Path disappear and Jimmy must rely on the resources and loyalty of his best friend H.R. Pufnstuf to get him out of trouble.
